## IWidgetClassNames interface

Interface for defining the class names of widget elements

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IWidgetClassNames 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [body?](./teamsfx-react.iwidgetclassnames.body.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The class name for the body part of the widget. |
|  [footer?](./teamsfx-react.iwidgetclassnames.footer.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The class name for the footer part of the widget. |
|  [header?](./teamsfx-react.iwidgetclassnames.header.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The class name for the header part of the widget. |
|  [root?](./teamsfx-react.iwidgetclassnames.root.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The class name for the root part of the widget. |
